overview: An incredible historical overview!  Be transported into the wild and wooly past of the American Wild West!  In this fascination 6 documentary collection, you'll find history, lore and biographies of the lives and times of those who populated the Wild West.  Gunfighters of the Old West features all sorts of legendary historical figures from pioneers and scouts to lawmen, outlaws, gangs and gunslingers, to the American cowboy.
tagline: gunfighters, old west, gunfighters of the old west
title: Gunfighters of the Old West
